fulltext:
Contact
+84 969005169 (Mobile)
thienbuifrontend@gmail.com
www.linkedin.com/in/thien-bui- frontend  (LinkedIn)
Top Skills
Front-end Development
Magento
Shopify
Thien Bui
Front-End Developer
Summary
I have over a year of experience in front end web development
with strong knowledge in development working with IT industry,
including research and analysis, design using Adobe Photoshop,
development, testing, implementation of code and website, mobile
app. 
Some of my key areas are HTML / CSS, JavaScript, Web/Mobile
Development, Reactive Native, React JS, Responsive design,
Testing.
And some of the frameworks I have experience are Magento2,
Wordpress, Shopify and Bigcommerce. I'm looking for new
opportunities to broaden my knowledge, please feel free to contact
me at thienbuifrontend@gmail.com.
Experience
Wsoftpro
Frontend Web Developer
May 2018 - Present 
Hanoi
- Have solid understanding of web fundamentals (HTML, CSS, JavaScript) and
some CMS such as Magento2, Wordpress, Shopify and BigCommerce, React
Native, React JS.
- Familiar with frameworks such as jQuery, Bootstrap.
- Implement the web applications, mobile applications, and APIs based on
ReactJS, React Native, and Magento2.
- Work with team of 6 or 7 people on several long term projects and
communicate directly with customers, who are mostly from Asia Pacific,
Europe and America, such as Icube (Indonesia), Moustache (New Zealand),
Zago Sweden. 
- Have responsibility to handle a whole project or small tasks, work well with
tester and project manager to delivery to customer. 
- Estimate time, update progress for customers at the end of the day
Page 1 of 2
- Manage code and review code from other team members, support trainees to
follow work flow 
Education
Hoa Binh University
Bachelors, Information Technology · (2015 - 2019)
Vietpro Academy
Basic and Advanced in HTML, CSS & JavaScript
Programming  · (2018 - 2018)
Page 2 of 2

experiences.detail:
Hanoi - Have solid understanding of web fundamentals (HTML, CSS, JavaScript) and some CMS such as Magento2, Wordpress, Shopify and BigCommerce, React Native, React JS. - Familiar with frameworks such as jQuery, Bootstrap. - Implement the web applications, mobile applications, and APIs based on
ReactJS, React Native, and Magento2. - Work with team of 6 or 7 people on several long term projects and communicate directly with customers, who are mostly from Asia Pacific, Europe and America, such as Icube (Indonesia), Moustache (New Zealand), Zago Sweden. - Have responsibility to handle a whole project or small tasks, work well with tester and project manager to delivery to customer.
- Estimate time, update progress for customers at the end of the day
- Manage code and review code from other team members, support trainees to follow work flow
